title: Random crash probably related to DataLoader
body_html:
I'm running a version of PyTorch updated before the ONNX got integrated. This is the first time I got this kind of crash (probably related to multi-threaded DataLoader), so even if it doesn't happen again maybe this stack is useful for some other investigation.

*** Error in `python': corrupted size vs. prev_size: 0x0000000048baf540 ***
======= Backtrace: =========
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x777e5)[0x7fdbe674f7e5]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x7e913)[0x7fdbe6756913]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x80678)[0x7fdbe6758678]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(cfree+0x4c)[0x7fdbe675c53c]
.../python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1(THFloatStorage_free+0x6e)[0x7fdbd517f4ae]
.../python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1(THFloatTensor_free+0x47)[0x7fdbd5198897]
.../python2.7/site-packages/torch/_C.so(+0x3264cd)[0x7fdbd5f7b4cd]

python[0x4fd90a]
python[0x4b5244]
python[0x4a6359]
python(PyEval_EvalFrameEx+0x5e98)[0x4c9e98]
python(PyEval_EvalCodeEx+0x255)[0x4c2765]
... similar lines ...

body:
I'm running a version of PyTorch updated before the ONNX got integrated. This is the first time I got this kind of crash (probably related to multi-threaded DataLoader), so even if it doesn't happen again maybe this stack is useful for some other investigation.

```
*** Error in `python': corrupted size vs. prev_size: 0x0000000048baf540 ***
======= Backtrace: =========
```
